channel.title: Editing Shops and Exp Rates
channel.description:
I have a little problem. Most people playing my server think that the experience rates are very slow, so I decided to raise them but I am note sure what folder it is called. I have a 508 Ninescape-source private server. It has the old Bulby. [b]Folders that are not correct *DON'T RE-POST THEM*:[/b] None
Also, I want to know where to edit my shop items and prices. I have checked my util folder in bin AND Bulby. Neither one has anything related to shops. This means don't post "shops.cgf". I do not have that config file because of my version of Bulby. I have even tried looking it up. People said to go to Players.java and edit something like [code]shopint[/code] or something but it wasn't in that file.
I also have a friend who is using the same source as me. He has looked and can also not find it.

item.title: Editing Shops and Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @qazdawg qazdawg
item.description:
@qazdawg wrote:

I have a little problem. Most people playing my server think that the experience rates are very slow, so I decided to raise them but I am note sure what folder it is called. I have a 508 Ninescape-source private server. It has the old Bulby.
Folders that are not correct DON’T RE-POST THEM:
None

Also, I want to know where to edit my shop items and prices. I have checked my util folder in bin AND Bulby. Neither one has anything related to shops.
This means don’t post “shops.cgf”. I do not have that config file because of my version of Bulby.
I have even tried looking it up. People said to go to Players.java and edit something like shopint or something but it wasn’t in that file.

I also have a friend who is using the same source as me. He has looked and can also not find it.

Read full topic
